Bug Fixes
Bug Fixes

* improved timetable rendering:
* periods outside the normal timegrid are now displayed (before timegrid start, after timegrid end, as well as on days outside the normal timegrid)
* break supervisions are now rendered bigger (are now clicka

* improved timetable rendering:
* periods outside the normal timegrid are now displayed (before timegrid start, after timegrid end, as well as on days outside the normal timegrid)
* break supervisions are now rendered bigger (are now clicka

Fixing a bug (app freeze) that occurred with some periods outside the normal school timegrid
Fixing a bug that opened the school search on every app start

Fixing a bug (app freeze) that occurred with some periods outside the normal school timegrid
Fixing a bug that opened the school search on every app start

1. Fixing a bug that could lead to loss of the login information (profile data)

2. Breaktime supervisions are now displayed in full height, even if they are substituted.

3. Smaller bug fixes for occasional messages such as:
"no right"

1. Fixing a bug that could lead to loss of the login information (profile data)

2. Breaktime supervisions are now displayed in full height, even if they are substituted.

3. Smaller bug fixes for occasional messages such as:
"no right"

* New feature: Teachers may now select a reason for an absence (if absence reasons have been configured by the WebUntis admin).

* New feature: Parent user accounts. Registered parents may now view the timetables of their children.

* Exams (t

* New feature: Teachers may now select a reason for an absence (if absence reasons have been configured by the WebUntis admin).

* New feature: Parent user accounts. Registered parents may now view the timetables of their children.

* Exams (t

* reworked the update mechanism: timetables are now continuously updated, a.a. in the daily timetable view

* new feature: timetables for subjects in the menu

* new feature for teachers: there is a new setting in the homework pop-up, enabling

* reworked the update mechanism: timetables are now continuously updated, a.a. in the daily timetable view

* new feature: timetables for subjects in the menu

* new feature for teachers: there is a new setting in the homework pop-up, enabling
Introducing the brand new UntisMobile App. We have completely redesigned the application and hope you enjoy using it.
Introducing the brand new UntisMobile App. We have completely redesigned the application and hope you enjoy using it.

• Problem with display of timetables fixed. If the problem occurred, please add the profile again.
• Minor bugfixes

• Problem with display of timetables fixed. If the problem occurred, please add the profile again.

• Exams are now displayed with the correct colours
• Performance improvements
